articles.title: How You'll Never Walk Alone came to define Liverpool FC's spirit - The Guardian
articles.description: The Rodgers and Hammerstein number became a football anthem via the late Gerry Marsden, bringing euphoric determination to every era of Liverpool FC from Shankly to Klopp
articles.content:
It never stops creating goosebumps, is how Liverpool manager Jürgen Klopp describes it. It never stops feeling really special.
